Class Account

java.lang.Object

              |
              +--net.juniper.smgt.ssp.action.Account
public class Account
extends SspAction

Handle requests to the "account" portal page.

The account page displays all currently subscribed services of a User and allows changes to the "ActivationTrigger", i.e. setting subscriptions to "MANUAL" or "ACTIVATE_ON_LOGIN".
